description: Good morning Kill Teamers, we’re interrupting the regular Monday Goonhammer content schedule to make sure everyone knows about the upcoming Kill Team tournament for GHO! We wouldn’t to deny our readers a chance to know about an upcoming entry to the WCW! Tickets are available now! Join us on July 6th and 7th at the […]
title: Kill Team Grand Tournament at the Goonhammer Open Baltimore 2024

description: In our How to Paint Everything series, we take a look at different armies of the Warhammer universe, examine their history and heraldry, and look at different methods for painting them. In this article we’re looking at how to paint the Adepta Sororitas, also known as the Sisters of Battle.
title: How to Paint Everything: The Adepta Sororitas / Sisters of Battle

description: THE BROS ARE BACK and much like the best basketball arcade game of the 90s they are ON FIRE.
title: Battle Bros Season Four, Chapter VIII: Burning Sensations
